testCases.label: Verify addition function
testCases.description: Checks that the JavaScript 'add' function correctly returns the sum of two numbers.

testCases.label: Verify subtraction function
testCases.description: Checks that the JavaScript 'subtract' function correctly returns the difference between two numbers.

testCases.label: Verify multiplication function
testCases.description: Checks that the JavaScript 'multiply' function correctly returns the product of two numbers.

testCases.label: Verify division function
testCases.description: Checks that the JavaScript 'divide' function correctly returns the quotient of two numbers and handles division by zero by returning 'undefined'.

testCases.label: Verify modulus function
testCases.description: Checks that the JavaScript 'modulus' function correctly returns the remainder of a division operation.

testCases.label: Verify exponentiation function
testCases.description: Checks that the JavaScript 'exponentiate' function correctly returns the result of raising one number to the power of another.
